sentences: Starting on guitar at when he was eight years old, he received lessons on classical guitar in school.
When he was ten he saw a Baden Powell concert in Paris and was also impressed by Jimmy Gourley.
During the 1990s he worked with Joey Baron, Lol Coxhill,  Glenn Ferris, Daniel Humair, Michel Portal, Sam Rivers, Aldo Romano, Louis Sclavis,  and Henri Texier.
He was a member of the Recyclers, Trash Corporation, and was a founder the Big Four in 2001 with Steven Bernstein, Bradley Jones, and Max Nagl.
Big Four, with Max Nagl, Steven Bernstein, Bradley Jones (Hatology, 2002)
Goodbye Gary Cooper (Make Up, 1999)With David Grubbs
Derek Bailey, Close to the Kitchen (Rectangle, 1996)
Philippe Katerine, Nom De Code: Sacha (Rectangle, 2002)
Evan Parker, Live at Les Instants Chavires (Leo, 1998)
